sobre.title: About GGABS Tech & Design
sobre.name: Gabriel Henrique Lins
sobre.description1: GGABS Tech & Design is an independent agency specializing in tailored digital solutions. I work at the intersection of technology and design to develop unique, functional, and visually impactful experiences.
sobre.description2: With a clear vision of turning ideas into reality, I created GGABS to provide digital solutions that empower businesses and fulfill dreams.
sobre.description3: My mission is to combine creativity and technology to deliver projects that make a difference. I believe that all businesses, regardless of size, deserve access to quality design and innovative technological solutions.
sobre.description4: Through GGABS, I aim to offer personalized and accessible solutions, helping companies transform their ideas into reality and reach their maximum potential.
sobre.quote: "To get something you never had, you have to do something you never did."

panels: Have a dream but don't know where to start?
Looking for someone to turn your idea into reality?
Find someone who understands your needs!
Your project comes to life with technology and creativity!
The result? Your dream realized in the best way!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are the most common questions clients ask me

questions.question: How long does it take to deliver a website?
questions.answer: The timeline varies depending on the project's complexity. Simple institutional websites take 7 to 15 days, while more advanced projects can take up to 30 days.

questions.question: Will the website be responsive for mobile and desktop?
questions.answer: Yes! All websites are developed to be 100% responsive, ensuring a seamless experience on both mobile and desktop devices.

questions.question: What technologies do you use to develop websites?
questions.answer: I work with modern tools like React, Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and hosting on platforms like Vercel, ensuring performance and security.

questions.question: How does website hosting work?
questions.answer: I can recommend and set up reliable hosting, such as Vercel or Netlify, to ensure high performance and security.

questions.question: Can I request changes after development starts?
questions.answer: Yes! Minor adjustments are included in the process. For major changes, we will assess the impact on timeline and budget.

questions.question: Is the website design customized?
questions.answer: Yes! Each website is designed to meet your business needs, with a unique and functional design.

questions.question: Do you create the website design, or do I need to provide a layout?
questions.answer: I can create a unique design using Figma, ensuring an intuitive and modern layout. If you already have a design, I can implement it.

questions.question: How long does it take to create a design?
questions.answer: An initial design typically takes 3 to 7 days, depending on complexity and required revisions.

questions.question: Can I use the design for materials other than the website?
questions.answer: Yes! Designs can be adapted for business cards, banners, or other materials, maintaining a consistent visual identity.

questions.question: Do you offer design revisions?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer up to two rounds of free revisions to ensure the design meets your expectations.

questions.question: What is a management system?
questions.answer: It’s a customized solution to organize your business processes, such as inventory, finances, or tasks, all within a digital platform.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop a management system?
questions.answer: It depends on complexity, but simple systems can take 15 to 30 days, while more robust ones may take up to 60 days.

questions.question: What technologies are used in management systems?
questions.answer: I use Java Spring Boot for the backend, PostgreSQL for the database, and React for modern, intuitive interfaces.

questions.question: Are management systems customized?
questions.answer: Yes! Each system is tailored to meet the specific needs of your business.

questions.question: Do you offer support after system delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, I provide technical support for adjustments and maintenance after delivery, as agreed in the project.

questions.question: What are GGABS Creations?
questions.answer: They are projects and SaaS (Software as a Service) that I personally designed and developed, focused on practical and customizable solutions for businesses and users.

questions.question: Does REAL really help with budgeting?
questions.answer: Yes! REAL is a budget simulator that simplifies creating quick and professional proposals with an intuitive design and practical functionality.

questions.question: Will Tarefex be free or paid?
questions.answer: Tarefex is an app I will launch with a free basic version. Premium versions with additional features can be developed on demand.

questions.question: How can Mesa Pronta help my business?
questions.answer: Mesa Pronta is an online management system (web app) for restaurants, simplifying order, delivery, menu, and reservation management. With a modern, intuitive interface, it optimizes service, streamlines workflow, and boosts sales, providing a complete experience for your customers.

questions.question: Can I request a customized GGABS Creation?
questions.answer: Yes! I can adapt or create new GGABS solutions tailored to your needs, such as landing pages or specific systems.

form.text: Feel free to ask anything about our services

depoimentos.title: Testimonials

testimonials.text: Your service is excellent, you have out-of-the-box ideas that enhance and bring life to the visual identity. I was very satisfied with your work, congratulations!
I am extremely excited to create my personal architecture brand and portfolio with GGABS.

Your logo truly impressed me! I was extremely satisfied. The service was very attentive, perfectly understanding my brand's proposal and offering a highly personalized service. I recommend them for their quality, creativity, and commitment.

intro.text: GGABS Tech & Design values the privacy of visitors to the website ggabstechdesign.com.br. This GGABS Tech & Design Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when accessing or using our official website. By browsing ggabs.com, you agree to the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree, we recommend that you do not use the website.

items.title: Information Provided by You
items.description: Data such as name, email, phone number, or other personal information you voluntarily provide when filling out forms, requesting quotes, sending emails, or contacting GGABS Tech & Design through other means.

items.title: Information Collected Automatically
items.description: Technical data such as IP address, browser type, operating system, pages visited, time and duration of your visit to ggabs.com, captured by cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze website performance.

items.title: Information from Third Parties
items.description: Data received from platforms such as social media or integrated services (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn) if you interact with GGABS Tech & Design through these tools, in accordance with their privacy policies.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: To respond to your questions, quote requests, or support inquiries sent to GGABS Tech & Design.
To improve the functionality, design, and content of the ggabs.com website, as well as the services and products offered.
To send communications, such as newsletters, project updates, or GGABS Tech & Design promotions, if you opt to receive them.
To comply with applicable legal obligations or to protect the rights, property, and safety of GGABS Tech & Design, our users, or the public.

sections.title: 3. Sharing of Information
items: GGABS Tech & Design does not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

We may share data with partners or service providers (e.g., website hosting, analytics tools, email services) that assist GGABS Tech & Design, always under agreements that ensure confidentiality and security.
In situations required by law, to respond to legal processes, or to protect the integrity of the ggabs.com website and our users.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
sections.text: The ggabs.com website uses cookies and similar technologies to personalize your experience, remember preferences, and analyze traffic. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may limit some functionalities of the GGABS Tech & Design website.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.text: GGABS Tech & Design implements robust technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or misuse. However, we acknowledge that no internet-connected system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of transmitted data.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
items: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting GGABS Tech & Design.
Opt out of receiving promotional communications at any time using the unsubscribe link or by contacting us directly.
In some jurisdictions, you may have additional rights under data protection laws (e.g., LGPD in Brazil), which we will respect as applicable.

sections.title: 7. Links to Third-Party Websites
sections.text: The ggabs.com website may contain links to external platforms, such as social media or project portfolios. GGABS Tech & Design is not responsible for the privacy policies or content of these third-party websites.

sections.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
sections.text: GGABS Tech & Design may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Changes will be posted on this page with the revised update date. We recommend that you review the GGABS Tech & Design Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.text: For questions, requests, or more information about this GGABS Tech & Design Privacy Policy, please contact:

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use of GGABS Tech & Design

intro.text: Welcome to the GGABS Tech & Design website. These GGABS Tech & Design Terms of Use establish the rules for accessing and using our official website, available at ggabstechdesign.com.br. By accessing or browsing this website, you agree to fully comply with these conditions. If you do not agree with these Terms of Use, we suggest that you immediately discontinue using the website.

section1.title: 1. Use of the Website
items: You are authorized to use the GGABS Tech & Design website solely for legitimate purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Use.

It is strictly prohibited to use the website for actions that violate legislation, harm third parties, or interfere with the website’s operation, such as hacking attempts, malware dissemination, or any illicit activity.

section2.title: 2. Intellectual Property
items: All elements of the GGABS Tech & Design website, including texts, designs, logos, images, and code, are exclusively owned by GGABS Tech & Design or its licensed partners and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws in Brazil.

You may view and use the website’s content for personal, non-commercial purposes, but you are not permitted to reproduce, share, modify, or commercialize any material without prior written authorization from GGABS Tech & Design.

section3.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
items: The GGABS Tech & Design website is provided 'as is,' without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not guarantee that the website will always be accessible, free of errors, or immune to technical issues.

GGABS Tech & Design shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or special damages arising from the use or unavailability of the website, except where Brazilian law requires specific liability.

section4.title: 4. Links to External Websites
section4.text: The GGABS Tech & Design website may include links to third-party platforms or services. We do not exercise control over these external websites and are not responsible for their content, practices, or privacy policies.

section5.title: 5. Updates to the Terms
section5.text: GGABS Tech & Design may revise or amend these Terms of Use at any time as needed. Changes take effect as soon as they are published on this page. Continued use of the website after such updates implies acceptance of the new terms.

section6.title: 6. Suspension of Access
section6.text: We reserve the right to suspend or block your access to the GGABS Tech & Design website at our discretion, particularly in cases of non-compliance with these Terms of Use or to protect the security of the website, our users, or our rights.

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law
section7.text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the Republic of Brazil. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts of Recife, PE, except where legislation specifies another jurisdiction.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.text: For questions, suggestions, or clarifications regarding these GGABS Tech & Design Terms of Use, please contact us:

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Here you can find some of the services we offer

exemplos.descricao: customized pages to showcase projects, skills, and achievements professionally
order and inventory control for restaurants
management of internal processes for companies
beautiful and functional menus for restaurants
banners, flyers, and social media posts

slides.title: Order Management System
slides.description: Develop a complete order system for your store, with easy management, inventory control, and online payment integration.

slides.title: Enterprise Management System (ERP)
slides.description: Automate and centralize your business management with advanced tools to control finances, inventory, and teams in an integrated way.

slides.title: Appointment Management System
slides.description: Simplify your appointments with an efficient and user-friendly system for both clients and managers.

slides.title: Visual Identity
slides.description: Create a strong and unique visual identity that connects your brand with your audience, leaving a lasting impression with impactful design.

slides.title: Digital Menu
slides.description: Offer a dynamic and easy-to-navigate digital menu for your customers, with customization and real-time update capabilities.

slides.title: Promotional Materials
slides.description: Develop eye-catching promotional materials to promote your brand, from flyers to online banners, with professional and creative design.

slides.title: E-Commerce
slides.description: Create a powerful and customized online store that converts visitors into customers with intuitive design and advanced functionality.

slides.title: Landing Pages
slides.description: Landing pages designed to capture leads and boost conversions with strategic layouts and impactful visuals.

slides.title: Portfolio
slides.description: Customized pages to showcase projects, skills, and achievements professionally, highlighting your work and experience in a visual and organized manner.

slides.title: Institutional Websites
slides.description: Build a solid online presence for your company or institution with websites that reflect your identity and values, optimized for engagement and usability.

E-Commerce: - This service is for you who owns a store and wants to expand sales strategically online.
- If you are an entrepreneur seeking optimization and enhanced results, this service is for you.
- For those who want to turn their store into a sales machine, this service is for you.
Landing Pages: - For you launching a product or service and needing a high-converting landing page!
- This service is ideal for startups and entrepreneurs aiming for a successful launch.
- If you are a marketing professional looking to boost campaign conversions, this service is for you.
Portfolio: - If you are an architect, designer, photographer, or creative professional, a digital portfolio is essential to showcase your work.
- Psychologists, coaches, and consultants can benefit from a professional website to present their services and strengths.
- For artists, writers, and freelancers wanting an attractive and functional digital showcase, this service is for you.
Institutional Websites: - This service is for companies seeking to establish a solid and professional online presence.
- If you have an institution and need an informative website, we have the perfect solution for you.
- For those who want to build trust with an institutional website that highlights your business credibility, this service is for you.
Order Management System: - If you own a restaurant, snack bar, bakery, convenience store, or any business handling orders, this system helps optimize your management.
- For establishments needing an efficient system to manage orders quickly and organized, we’re here to help!
- This service is for you, entrepreneur in the food, retail, or service industry, seeking an error-free, productive order platform.
Enterprise Management System (ERP): - If your company needs process integration and greater financial control, this service is ideal for you.
- For businesses aiming to automate operations and improve efficiency, this ERP system will transform your management.
- For those seeking a comprehensive solution to manage their business intelligently, this ERP is for you.
Appointment Management System: - For clinics, salons, barbershops, tattoo studios, and other businesses relying on appointments, this system helps organize and optimize your routine.
- This service is ideal for professionals needing to manage schedules quickly and efficiently, ensuring convenience for clients and staff.
- If you want to transform your practice management with an efficient appointment system, this service is for you.
Visual Identity: - If you own a brand and want to stand out in the market, this visual identity service is for you.
- For startups building their market image, this service helps create a unique and powerful identity.
- For those seeking a brand refresh for their company or product, this visual identity service is for you.
Digital Menu: - If you own a restaurant, cafeteria, or food truck and want to modernize service with a digital menu, this service is for you.
- This service is ideal for food establishments seeking convenience and innovation in customer service.
- For you, restaurant owner, wanting to offer a modern and user-friendly digital menu to your customers, we’re ready to help!
Promotional Materials: - This service is for companies running campaigns and wanting to engage their audience with creative promotional materials.
- For marketing professionals aiming to impact clients with high-quality promotional materials.
- For those with a business wanting to attract more clients with customized promotional materials, this service is for you.
